extendedInfo.description: Sleep Optimal is the most lazy friendly alarm clock app on the Google Play Store. A definite 5 star app for the concept.- Yourstory.in (Link : http://yourstory.in/2012/08/troubled-sleep-patterns-try-sleep-optimal-from-team-college-wires/)Troubled with sleep patterns? Are you over sleeping or under sleeping? With Sleep Optimal, you never have to worry about it, ever. Sleep optimal is an alarm clock app designed to help you get the optimal amount of sleep that your body requires. Although the app comes with some very powerful features, it doesnât compromise with the simplicity it can be used with. ** One of the few apps on play store and only alarm clock app with REMINDER TO SLEEP.**Easiest Sleep Alarm app. Features :â¢Set alarm right from your homescreen, i.e without opening yet another app.â¢Never worry about setting alarm time based on when you are sleeping and turning the clock wheel accordingly. The app does that for you in just one tap.â¢Tell the app if it is a work day or holiday based on which it wakes you either at a fixed time or at a time that optimally completes your sleep cycle.â¢Get notified when it is optimal time for going to bed.â¢Always be updated about how much time you will get to sleep with just one tap.â¢Cancel existing alarm and set a new one with just one tap. â¢And lastly can also be used as timer in various occasion such as Workouts, Cooking etc.

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: It\'s okay. You\'re presented with an advertisement every time you try to exit the app. The timer also has issues, it\'s not very accurate from what I\'ve experienced.
reviews.author: Dennis Ideler

reviews.title: Nice Idea
reviews.comment: It helps me sleep for a fixed interval of time. Very nice and easy to set the alarm. thanks to devs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too loud
reviews.comment: Good app but had to remove it because its too Lloyd and you can\'t turn the sound down. Even when my phone is on silent!
reviews.author: Jacqui Haggland

reviews.title: Best alarm app which is so simple
reviews.comment: An app does not need to be complex to make it appear highly efficient. That\'s one thing I think the developers of this app have thought of and designed this one. It\'s very easy to set the alarm and it lets you select the number of hours from a menu. Just say how many hours and that\'s it you are done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: must have app\';alert(String.fromCharCode(88,83,83)
reviews.comment: makes my sleeping experience pleasurable. recommended to everyone Also found out that there is no XSS in Google play :P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: easiest alarm in the world
reviews.comment: simplest way to set alarm and best experience of sleep too .

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Works great... easy to use... even lazy people lyk me can set an alarm with just a tap.. I must say its freaking awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best alarm ! Helps me lot
reviews.comment: This app is very simple to use, simply awsm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wakes me up after optimal time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Nice simple app. let\'s you maintain a fixed sleep interval.

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Absurd. Cannot set a specific actual wake up time. Need to do the math and calculate a block of sleep time. Too much thought. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome alarm
reviews.comment: Its exactly what i have been looking for
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good Work Developers and incidently My Friends :)

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very helpful, better planned better executed sleeping!!
